channel.title: NewEra - Customs - Vote4cash & Points - Many bosses
channel.description:
[url=http://new-era.ucoz.com]http://new-era.ucoz.com[/url] - Website [url=http://new-era.net78.net/Website%20v3/webclient.html]http://new-era.net78.net/Website%20v3/webclient.html[/url] - Play Now
PK and ECO server Join and check it out! Friendly Staff. Always trying to do players suggestions and requests.
Features
*Vote4cash & points *Stable economy *Many shops *Dicing *Clue scrolls *Perfect PK *Many Bosses *Multiple Training Locations *Every skill has its own area to train *Choose Sarter Pure, Main, Zerk, Skiller, Ranger *Many Minigames including Castlewars *Skilling *Full Screen (only in desktop client.) *Customs [IMG]http://new-era.ucoz.com/Customs.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img401/7089/vf5.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img835/6511/ce6p.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/310/dbj.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/3756/yn9.png[/img]
